entry.title: Geodesic walker
entry.details: Web demo which traces out geodesics on a mesh. The code is available here.

entry.title: ShaderToy Demos
entry.details: Algorithm demonstrations on ShaderToy. Mostly from my paper on ray tracing harmonic functions.

entry.title: Hyperbolic notes
entry.details: Notes on hyperbolic geometry and discrete conformal maps.

entry.title: Tartan shader
entry.details: A shader to make meshes tartan.

entry.title: Blended Piecewise Möbius Maps
entry.details: GLSL implementation of BPM: Blended Piecewise Möbius Maps by Rorberg, Vaxman & Ben-Chen, incorporated into polyscope.

entry.title: Computing orientable double covers
entry.details: Takes any triangle mesh and turns it into an orientable manifold mesh by constructing the orientable double cover.

entry.title: Split to Delaunay
entry.details: This is a rough implementation of the Delaunay edge split algorithm presented in Efficient construction and simplification of Delaunay meshes by Yong-Jin Liu, Chunxu Xu, Dian Fan, and Ying He. It takes in a triangle mesh and then performs edge splits to make the mesh Delaunay.

entry.title: Spherical Karcher means
entry.details: Web demo computing the Karcher mean of points on a sphere.

entry.title: Pendulum phase space
entry.details: Visualization of the phase space of a pendulum as a cylinder.

entry.title: Euler integrators
entry.details: Comparison of explicit, implicit, and symplectic Euler integrators for a pendulum.

entry.title: Combinatorial maps
entry.details: Demo of an implementation of the combinatorial map data structure for n-dimensional simplicial complexes that I experimented with in geometry-central. It has not yet made its way into the library itself, but the implementation can be found here.

entry.title: Word validator
entry.details: Online tool to check if a word is in the dictionary.
